name: DeathMaze - Dungeon Crawler
description:
DeathMaze - Dungeon Crawler is a brutal, difficult and dynamic 2d shooter. The game is about making records and beating them. 

Everything is different every time. The map is generated randomly. Use good your arsenal to kill monsters effectively. The goal of the game is to reach the largest maze! Walking through dark corridors and rooms in search items necessary for survival. The mazes get scarier over time.

 

     This is not an easy game. You have to learn how to play!

In another dimension, there are dark corridors filled with monsters and rooms. You will find many weapons and items that are left over from people trying to survive here. Fight and go as far as possible!

To get as far as possible, you need to systematically collect ammunition and weapons. By leaving the maze too quickly without checking the room, you leave a lot of ammo behind you. Stay in the maze for too long will also not benefit you, as you will be wasting ammunition.

  

Monsters are not sleeping. They move around the maze looking for a living human! They can open doors and attack in groups. After a while, bones lying on the ground will form a skeleton that can tear bones off and throw them at you. Lying half-dead ghouls spit poisonous guts. Gladiators destroy everything in their way! A killed zombie rises from the dead! You must remember all of this, otherwise you will die. In higher mazes and difficulty levels, the game is challenging and very dynamic!

 

 

Quickly pull out the weapons necessary to eliminate the monster and plan your attacks.

The arsenal is not huge, but very diverse. Each weapon works differently! Player must master the quick drawing of weapons to kill monsters quickly! Weapons work differently for each enemy!

 

Play and make a record that no one can beat! Connect in-game to Your GAMEJOLT account or play as a guest. Enter login and Your account token. After a successful connection to Your account, the game will save the account. It will automatically log into account when You start the game.Having an account on GAMEJOLT is not required to create records!

 

  • Once you check the rooms and collect all the items, enter the next maze. Don't stay in one maze for a long time, you will only lose a lot of ammo
  • Destroy the monsters and don't get killed. Collect items and weapons to survive
  • Learn the correct use of weapons
  • Kill monsters quickly with the arsenal created for this
  • Be agile, avoid monsters' hits and attack wisely
  • The killed monsters will get more health points if you punch or kick them before they die
  • Every three mazes there is a huge chest. You need a key to open it
  • Obtain books of the demon from the mirror
  • You can use the demon's book to defeat a large horde or enter the Demon's labyrinth and beath him
  • The game requires skill and mastery
  • Watch out for mirrors, they are deadly
  • You decide for yourself whether you will make the record or whether you want to defeat the Demon
  • Upgrade your weapons
  • You can summon the demon in the mirror. To do this, you need three books of the demon

 

In-game controls WASD - Movement LMB - Shoot, attack / use RMB - Second attack SCROLL - Sword interaction / Weapon select Q - Hide weapon / hand X - Flares F - Flashlight ON/OFF E - Open doors / interaction 1-7 Weapon select TAB - Upgrade menu ESC - Exit to game menu CTRL - Crouch (Passage through the spikes) F3 - Changing the mouse cursor (in maze)   Requirements

WINDOWS XP, 7, 8, 10

DIRECT X, DIRECT 9 (click to download) 250kb

4GB RAM

2GB VRAM

Display resolution: 1920 x 1080, 1680 x 1050, 1366 x 768

 

This is a demo of my game. My vision of the game, a fully playable prototype. My goal is to create a second part four times better than this one.

Make a huge project as the full title of 'DeathMaze - Dungeon Crawler'

Don't misjudge this version. The game was created on an old engine, it does not have great graphics and optimization. This version is a show of the gameplay and the game I want to create.

You can help the game develop! It' free. Watch the game page and watch my account & subscribe YouTube channel. This gives motivation to continue working! 

 

Basic informations.

The Mirror

*By sticking the sword into the mirror, you will receive healing souls.

*Some monsters can destroy the mirror.

*There can be several mirrors in one room.
